original_text: The proud have hid a snare for me, and cords; they have spread a net by the wayside; they have set gins for me. Selah.
korean_text: 교만한 자가 나를 해하려고 올무와 줄을 놓으며 길 곁에 그물을 치며 함정을 두었나이다 (셀라)

sentences.original_text: The proud have hid a snare for me
sentences.korean_translation: 교만한 자들이 나를 위해 올무를 숨겼고

sentences.original_text: they have spread a net by the wayside
they have set gins for me
